Hydras/Puppet Hydras::

"Good..."said the male and he put the helmet, Puppet Hydras opened 
it's eyes and it was an exactly copy of Hydras, even it's signature 
was the same"Remember" said Hydras by his puppet"This must be 
secret... If any of you say a word of this... you will regret the 
day that your spark started to be online... Follow me..."

The puppet moved towards the Room exit.
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras:
> > 
> > Hydras reached a Room where he only could reach and presed some 
> > buttons, a door opened and... Hydras appeared? How could it be? 
It 
> > was a electronic puppet what was identically Hydras.
> > 
> > Following the same idea as Megatron of Beast Wars, Perceptor did 
one 
> > to Hydras for one ocation as this. The control was simple: the 
chair 
> > picked up the signals of his torso and legs and send them to the 
> > puppet to move it. some special "Gloves" picked the signal of 
his 
> > arms and hands, and as the "Chair" sent it to the puppet. A 
Special 
> > helmet trasmited to receptor what the puppet see and heard and a 
> > microphone let receptor sent his voice to the puppet.
> > 
> > "AS you see "hissed Hydras"I was keeping this little puppet for 
> > ocattions of this... Now here are my commands: YOu Inferno and 
> > QuickStrike will follow this puppet and will act as normally, as 
if 
> > this thing is me... If this puppet it's destruyed you imediatly 
come 
> > back base... Waspinator will remain here with me... I might need 
you 
> > at hand... Understand????"
> > while he was giving his instructions he was sitting done in the 
> > chair and dressing the "gloves". 
> > 
> "No problem here." Quickstrike said giving the okay sign.
> "Yes my Queen." Inferno answered bowing before Hydras.
> The two bots awaited the artificial Hydra's next move.
